description: Plantronic GameCom 377 Open-Ear Gaming GameCom 377 Open-EarGaming headset delivers rugged construction and vigorous sound. A lightweight frame and specially designed earpods redistribute pressure for maximumcomfort, while the open-ear design lets you catchall the in-game sound effects without losing touchwith your surroundings. When you're ready to fireoff orders, unveil the hidden, noise-canceling mic boom to strategize clearly with team members. Responses coming in? Adjust audio levels using in-line volume and mic-mute controls. When you?re done,rotate and tuck the mic boom inside the headset--then let your score do the talking.
title: Plantronics GameCom Open-Ear Gaming Headset with Full Range Stereo
